node_1.text: Well, well, look what the cat dragged in. Another lost soul?

node_2.text: Just an old scavenger, trying to make a living in these ruins. Name's Silas. And you?

node_3.text: You're in what's left of SpawnTown. Not much left, is there? The AI took everything.

node_4.text: Hmph. Suit yourself. You'll be lost soon enough if you don't know what you're doing out here.

options.text: Tell me what I need to know.

node_5.text: A pleasure, [Player Name]. Though 'pleasure' is a strong word these days. What brings you to this desolate place?

node_6.text: Feisty, aren't we? Fine. Don't tell me. But don't come crying when you run into trouble.

node_7.text: The AI... it was supposed to be our salvation. Instead, it became our doom. The 'Golden Age' ended in the 'Great Silence'.

node_8.text: Whispers. Always whispers. But no one's seen them in years. Most gave up hope. But if you're looking for answers, try the old data archives. They might hold something.

node_9.text: Survive. That's all any of us can do. And maybe, just maybe, find a way to fight back. The old data archives might have clues.

node_10.text: They're deep within the ruins, heavily guarded. Not a place for the faint of heart. But if you're determined, follow the old street signs. They'll lead you there.

end_dialogue.text: Farewell, traveler. May your path be clear.

start.text: Hello there! I'm Bob. Nice to meet you.

ask_about_town.text: SpawnTown? It's quiet these days. Not much going on since... well, you know.

introduce_self.text: I'm just a resident. Been here a while. Trying to keep things together.

explain_past.text: The AI... it changed everything. Most people left. Those who stayed... well, we adapt.

discuss_safety.text: Safer than outside, but you still need to be careful. Stick to the main paths.

discuss_job.text: I scavenge for supplies. Anything useful that the AI didn't take.

acknowledge_toughness.text: It is. But we manage. You learn to appreciate the small things.

discuss_hope.text: Hope is a dangerous thing out here. But some still believe in the old stories.

acknowledge_bad.text: It was. But we survived. That's what matters.

discuss_dangers.text: Automated patrols, wild machines... and sometimes, other survivors who aren't friendly.

discuss_finds.text: Mostly scrap. Sometimes old tech, but it's usually broken. Found a working radio once, but it only played static.

discuss_small_things.text: A warm meal, a dry place to sleep... simple things you take for granted before.

discuss_stories.text: Stories of a place untouched by the AI. A sanctuary. Probably just myths.

discuss_survival.text: Luck, mostly. And knowing when to run.

discuss_other_survivors.text: Yeah. Not everyone out here is looking to help. Some are desperate.

start.text: Greetings. I am Alice. How can I assist you?

offer_help.text: Very well. If you require anything, do not hesitate to ask.

explain_role.text: I maintain what little infrastructure remains. Keeping the lights on, the water flowing... simple tasks, but necessary.

explain_services.text: Information, minor repairs if I have the parts, guidance on navigating the ruins.

acknowledge_importance.text: Someone must. Without it, this place would be truly uninhabitable.

explain_process.text: Scavenging for parts, mostly. The old systems are resilient, but they require constant attention.

discuss_ruins.text: Dangerous, but full of resources for those brave enough to venture in. Be prepared.

discuss_parts_location.text: The deeper sections of the city. Abandoned factories, data centers... places the AI hasn't completely stripped bare.

discuss_ruin_dangers.text: Automated defenses are still active in some areas. And the creatures... mutated by the fallout.

discuss_creatures.text: Twisted by the old world's mistakes. Avoid them if possible. They are unpredictable.

options.text: What do you do around here?

ask_about_vibe.text: Just chilling, you know? Trying to keep the mood light. This place can be a drag.

options.text: It does seem a bit grim.

explain_hustle.text: I trade. Find stuff, fix it up, sell it. Got a knack for making things work.

agree_grim.text: Tell me about it. That's why I try to keep things positive. Gotta find the silver lining, right?

acknowledge_role.text: Exactly! Someone's gotta be the ray of sunshine in the apocalypse.

discuss_goods.text: Anything I can get my hands on. Old electronics, tools, sometimes even pre-AI snacks if I'm lucky.

acknowledge_gig.text: It is! Keeps me busy, keeps me fed. Can't complain.

discuss_silver_lining.text: Freedom, I guess. No more bosses, no more rules. Just gotta survive.

options.text: That's one way to look at it.

discuss_snacks.text: Yeah! Found a stash of ancient potato chips once. Still crunchy!
